SEARCH
Package com.SuperheroSightings.springbootrestjdbctemplatemaven.service

Interface SightingService

All Known Implementing Classes:
SightingServiceImpl
public interface SightingService
Service interface for managing operations related to sightings. This interface defines the core business operations associated with the sightings of superheroes. It provides methods for adding, retrieving, updating, and deleting sightings, as well as retrieving all sightings. Implementing classes will provide concrete implementations of these methods, ensuring the correct business logic and operations are applied consistently across sighting-related functionalities.

      Sighting getSightingById(int id)
      Retrieves a specific sighting by its ID.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the sighting to retrieve.
      Returns:
      the corresponding sighting object, or null if not found.
